channel.title: [Mobile] The Simpsons: Tapped Out
channel.description:
[img]http://ugeeko.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/the_simpsons_tapped_out.jpg[/img] I know for a fact this is on iOS and Android, but I'm unsure about windows mobile. It's basically sims for the mobile, but has Simpsons and missions. I'm sure there were other games like this in the past, but I play this.
There are daily login rewards, rewards for collecting players, and some other lousy ones. And if that doesn't entice you, you get to make your own Springfield and also make your own krusty land.
If you do play, you should post your origin names below, so I can add you and gain some more rewards.
I also have a hacked copy of the game, where I have infinite doughnuts, so, that's always a bonus for me to help you. [s]They just patched it :c.[/s] Re-hacked.

item.title: [Mobile] The Simpsons: Tapped Out
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:20, topic:538733”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=657565.msg4399238#msg4399238 date=1390145784]
So why hasn’t there been a topic sooner?
[/quote]
You expecting a thread for every mobile app now?[/quote]
Yes. I expect a thread for each and every one of the millions of apps out there.
No, it’s sarcasm. I made this thread to get others to play and share their origin names so we can work together.

Read full topic

item.title: [Mobile] The Simpsons: Tapped Out
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

KroniKz_:

Oh sounds really fun actually! Well about the downside, do the developers give updates?

Constantly. They just updated a few days ago. It was to remove the snow and christmas stuff, but they always add more content. It also parallels with the show, so there is always new content based off of what’s going on in the series.

Read full topic

item.title: [Mobile] The Simpsons: Tapped Out
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

KroniKz_:

Looks interesting, never played sims, what do you do?

You’re in charge of rebuilding springfield, but in your own image. As the game progresses you unlock characters, buildings, decorations and such to build the land how you’d like. There are a few downsides to the customization’s (like not being able to rotate objects in a full square) but all in all it’s still pretty good.
You do quests and side quests (plus other activities) to gain money, which is used to buy houses and so forth.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

KroniKz_:

Looks interesting, never played sims, what do you do?

Rebuilding springfield after Homer destroyed it, By doing quest you can receive coins and characters.
